author: Neal J. Leitereg
title: Former boxing champ Oscar De La Hoya lands a condo in Pasadena for $2.65 million
text:
Former boxing champ Oscar De La Hoya lands a condo in Pasadena for $2.65 million Hot Property | Oscar De La Hoya Podley Properties | Inset: Los Angeles Times Boxing great Oscar De La Hoya has paid $2.65 million for a condo at the Montana in Pasadena.
